page.title: 05Leisure Persuits In Woolton
page.content: For both children and adults Woolton offers plenty of leisure activities. At the{Boy's Club}there is B.M.X. Group and young people can participate in classes for gymnastics, majorettes and dancing. Young people can also join the Guides, Brownies, Scouts and Cubs. An active Boy's Brigade is attached to the{Methodist Church.} Children attending the{Parish Church} Youth Club can join in games of football, badminton, pool and snooker. The Church Drama Group puts on regular productions. The{Old People's {Centre}offers different leisure activities and for more active members of the community there is a Keep Fit Class and 2 golf courses in the area. The 100 year old{Village Club}offers bowling and snooker. The Public {Swimming Baths}has 2 Swimming Clubs and Water Polo. KERRY ANN SMITH
